I'm going to visit New York City on my next vacation.
First on my agenda is going to a Broadway show.
And after that I want to explore Central Park.
I heard you can ice skate there in the winter!
I also want to cross the Brooklyn Bridge,...
...and see the Statue of Liberty in New York Harbor.
I won't have a car while I'm there,...
...but there are a lot of ways for tourists to get around New York.
You can take a train from Grand Central Station,...
...or ride the subway to most points in the city.
I hope I can see all these things in only three days!
